title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2029/94 of 8 August 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2191/81 on the granting of aid for the purchase of butter by non-profit-making institutions and organizations
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2029/94 of 8 August 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2191/81 on the granting of aid for the purchase of butter by non-profit-making institutions and organizations
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2191/81, 'ECU 138' is hereby replaced by 'ECU 130'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 August 1994.
For the Commission
Hans VAN DEN BROEK
Member of the Commission
